atlantic.title: ISIS Is Losing Its Greatest Weapon: Momentum
atlantic.topComment: On to the next boogie man eh? I'm sure it won't take long, FOX is on a 24 - 48 hour paranoia refresh cycle. Gotta keep granny and grampy quaking in their boots, and glued to the tube. Those disposable catheters aren't going to sell themselves.

atlantic.title: Taming Christian Rage
atlantic.topComment: "Should people be required to do work in service of something they disagree with?" I didn't support the Bush/Cheney wars. Can I get a refund on my taxes?
